resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>41f190f0-9817-4194-8f8d-1e588dd78d2d#1#13</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hidegháború indulása</string>
            <string language="en">The starting of the Cold War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Beginnen des kalten Krieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commencer de la guerre froide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Começar da guerra fria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Iniziare della guerra fredda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έναρξη του ψυχρού πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El comenzar de la guerra fría</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fultoni beszéd, Truman-doktrína</string>
            <string language="en">Speech  of Fulton, Truman-doctrine</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hidegháború,  NATO,  Varsói Szerződés,  fultoni beszéd,  bipoláris világ,  Amerikai Egyesült Államok,  Szovjetunió,  </string>
            <string language="en">cold war, NATO, Warsaw Pact,  fullton speech, bipolar world, The United States of America, Soviet Union</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rede von Fulton, Truman-Lehre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discours de Fulton, Truman-doctrine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso de Fulton, Truman-doutrina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Discorso di Fulton, Truman-dottrina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία Fulton, τρuμαν-δόγμα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discurso de Fulton, Truman-doctrina</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kalter Krieg, NATO, Warschau Pakt, fullton Rede, 
zweipolige Welt, die Staaten von Amerika, Sowjet-Anschluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">guerre froide, l'OTAN, pacte de Varsovie, la parole de 
fullton, monde bipolaire, Etats-Unis d'Amérique, Union Soviétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">guerra fria, OTAN, pact de Warsaw, discurso do fullton,
mundo bipolar, o Estados Unidos da América, Soviete-união</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la guerra fredda, la NATO, il patto de Varsavia, il 
discorso del fullton, il mondo bipolare, unito Dichiara 
dell'America, Soviet-unione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ψυχρός πόλεμος, ΝΑΤΟ, σύμφωνο της Βαρσοβίας, fullton 
ομιλία, διπολικός κόσμος, οι Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες της Αμερικής, 
Σοβιετική Ένωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">guerra fría, OTAN, pacto de Varsovia, discurso del 
fullton, mundo bipolar, el Estados Unidos de América, Soviet-unio'n</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">17-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
